title: Ping issues
body: Hey Riot or anyone, would you help me out. On my main account every time I log in, I seem to lag and hit at least 500ms constant and slows my whole internet down, it has been happening to me since the update happened, but ive noticed if i log onto my other account, the lag isnt there at all. I was just wondering if its my internet connection or not.

replies.body:
Your connection shouldn't change based on your account unless your other account is on another region. High latency is often caused by either issues along your route to the server or issues with your local network settings. As your first step, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are good.

Let me know if you have any other issues with this.
